title: Bones
description: Now that the Ark is complete and the head of Chimera Enterprises is in custody, Seth believes he is ready to enjoy a normal human life at last. But a new enemy soon appears â€“ one that threatens to expose the existence of werekin to the world. As the human-werekin Alliance crumbles, J.J. races to the Amazon to find the Tortoise Clan, an ancient werekin clan who may have the answers to save Earth from the power of the Totems, and Chimera Enterprises turns Seth to their cause with an enchantment even true love may not be enough to break.
author: Jesse Daro
